Performance measurement and the prediction of capital project failure
whether and how social and environmental performance are (should be) measured, managed and rewarded;
the role and integration of sustainability issues in planning and risk assessment processes;
the connection between external reporting and internal management accounting and control practices;
theoretical perspectives that may inform decision making and control with respect to sustainability.
